author: Ann Saphir
title: Timeline: Fed's response - pandemic downturn vs financial crisis
description: The economic dislocation caused by the coronavirus crisis is unfolding with breathtaking speed.
content:
SAN FRANCISCO/WASHINGTON (Reuters) - The economic dislocation caused by the coronavirus crisis is unfolding with breathtaking speed.
